title: Max Keiser - On The Edge 2011 Apr 22 FR [sebaygo1]
description:
.
				
On The Edge (Press TV)
- with Max Keiser -
Friday, 22 April 2011


[sebaygo1]


Another of Max's many media projects, this one airs on Iran's Press TV. <a href="
http://www.presstv.com" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.presstv.com</a> <a href="
http://www.presstv.ir" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.presstv.ir</a>


Brad Cooke, CEO of Endeavour Silver, is Max's guest in this edition of Press TV's On the Edge with Max Keiser where they have an excellent discussion about precious metals.



The .mp3 is extracted audio from the Press TV video. You can watch the video at these links:

part 1 of 2

part 2 of 2

 It is my opinion that in this time it is virtually
 essential to seek information from a variety of sources, 
 to listen to a spectrum of voices in order to better 
 understand the "big picture." A reliance solely upon
 mainstream corporate media for news and info is a 
 prescription for ignorance. I try to share information
 that counters the monotone of mainstream corporate media.
 
 NOTE: The material here is made available strictly as
 information. Do not assume support or endorsement on my
 part of the contents. 

 Think for yourself! To paraphrase the late William Cooper: 
 Read everything, listen to everything, but believe nothing 
 until you've researched it yourself.
